root: ^Merchant: Welcome valued customer... wait a kid the hell do you want
^Alexander: No no you had it right the first time I'm here as a customer
^Alexander: and I'm not a kid I'm already 18 and I'm gonna enlist as a soldier
^Alexander: so I can fight back against the monsters
^Merchant: Hmm I see well as long as you have money
^Alexander: Yea of course so can I see your wares
^Merchant: Of course anything for a paying customer is what I would usually say
^Merchant: Shop currently closed (the dev hasn't finished it yet)
^Alexnader: Oh I see I'll be back then
